capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he's actually 11 years old. I'm pretty sure that's correct, you know? He seems like a responsible kid for his age, but I guess that's what happens when you're 11 - everything feels so serious!
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of belongings does dudley have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I have to say, he seems like a pretty self-centered person. He always puts his own needs before everyone else's, which can be really frustrating at times. I'm not sure if that's just his personality or if there's something more going on, but it definitely makes interactions with him challenging.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of someone being described as selfish before, valeria, can you tell me more about what that means to you?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Dudley's personality is often described as selfish. I've noticed that about him myself. He can come across as quite self-centered at times.
